short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the classic Snake game directly from your google chrome toolbar!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snake Game on Google Chrome allows you to enjoy the classic Snake game without leaving your browser. Choose your difficulty level, start the game, and try to achieve the highest score! Once you're done, share your score with friends on Twitter and Facebook directly from the extension. Our user-friendly interface ensures a seamless gaming experience. The game follows the traditional rules: guide the snake to the food, and avoid colliding with the walls or yourself.
